|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [abort()](./sdk-core.asynctimer.abort.md) |  | Aborts the timer: rejects the promise (if any) and stops the timer. |
|  [isStopped()](./sdk-core.asynctimer.isstopped.md) |  | Returns whether the timer is stopped. |
